title: Interchangeable Champ Select?
body:
I was just wondering if we will ever be able to sort the champs we like to play and the champs we want to play more etc. into categories in the near future. 

Just like this: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/KpWbwExi-amazing-champ-select-idea

replies.body: There is no need for this at all. Especially when you are given more than enough time to select the champion you want to play and there is a search function to quickly find the champion.
